text: Allison Patrício, known as Allison (born 31 January 1986) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Mafra. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Mafra on 8 August 2015 in a game against Gil Vicente. ==References== ==External links== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Criciúma Esporte Clube players Category:C.D. title: Allison Patrício
